name: Wild Fire (Newagegamer, SaibaShadow)
description:
Your Job is to keep your pet fire alive. He requires food and attention to live day to day so make sure to keep him happy. 

Connor Munro(SaibaShadow) - Lead Coder and 3D guy

Simon Stockley(Newagegamer) - Level Designer and Particle effect

Ashveer Jugdav(Ashcubed) -  Coder and Consultant (unpaid intern jk)

Main tools 

Axe 

The Axe is used to get wood from the wild area which is required to feed your pet. Trees in the wild area respawn regularly. Make sure to stock up to have food for your pet 

Whistle 

The whistle calls your pet to you and then allows you to either pet it or play ball with it. Both these tasks raise his attention mentor and stop him from running away 

Capture Gun 

If your pet does not get enough attention and love he will decide he wants to run away. It's up to you to track him down in the wild area and calm him down with the capture gun. 

Poop Hoover

Your pet is like every other pet he has to do something with his waste. It's up to you as a good pet owner to clean up after him using this Hoover 

Gas can 

Sometimes, things go wrong and you forgot to feed your pet for a bit. Don't stress just give him a bit of good old Gas(Lights any fire up) to make your pet happy again
